TopicTitle: [1.0.4][Kopernicus]KerbolPlus v.2.3.9 - a planet pack that ads the legendary Gas Planet 2 and more.

Articles.Content:
> 
> I got it to work ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> also just a question about science, can we still take surface samples and eva reports on the K+ planets or do we not have the option?

You can, but you won't get personalised science descriptions.

> 
> You can, but you won't get personalised science descriptions.

alright, thanks for all the help ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

So it seems like KillAshley has created a new, better version of Kerbol Plus. What should I do now? My plan is to rename this mod to "Kerbol Origins" and start a new thread after deleting this one, to mark th start of a new age for the mod. 90% of the mod has been so far replaced (in dev version). Release date of 2.4 is still on Christmas. **Prepare.**

![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-06T14:00:14Z" title="11/06/2015 02:00  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 6, 2015</time> by amarius1**
  
P.S. liked u Kerbol Plus, now you're someone else's "lover"... :(

> So it seems like KillAshley has created a new, better version of Kerbol Plus. What should I do now? My plan is to rename this mod to "Kerbol Origins" and start a new thread after deleting this one, to mark th start of a new age for the mod. 90% of the mod has been so far replaced (in dev version). Mmmm ok... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

SO you do not want to be developer anymore... Right? BTW started revamping dwarf planets after making Fonso procedural using Vertex Planet. 5th iteration of Fonso so far.

> 
> Mmmm ok... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

>

They aren't the same planets realy... Most of the 2.4 doesn't even match with what was before. Keelon still needs to get a new texture actualy...

> 
> They aren't the same planets realy... Most of the 2.4 doesn't even match with what was before. Keelon still needs to get a new texture actualy...

I am about to release GN 0.0.8, it has a patch for Kerbol Plus. should I wait for 2.4?

since you plan to overhaul so much I guess my patch will probably be broken once you release 2.4

> 
> I am about to release GN 0.0.8, it has a patch for Kerbol Plus. should I wait for 2.4?
> since you plan to overhaul so much I guess my patch will probably be broken once you release 2.4

Keep it, since there still is a long time to 2.4. It will also be named Kerbol Origins since KillAshley made a remade copy of the pack. So much for the Kerbol Plus name ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> there still is a long time to 2.4.

The clouds seem to work as advertised, so when it comes to EVE support I'm almost done.

Also, I'm still waiting on Dropbox. I've got my account set up and everything... Anyhow, should I balance the gravity and fix Keelon's atmosphere?

> 
> The clouds seem to work as advertised, so when it comes to EVE support I'm almost done.
> Also, I'm still waiting on Dropbox. I've got my account set up and everything... Anyhow, should I balance the gravity and fix Keelon's atmosphere?

If you can PM me or amarius your emailadress, we can add you

Sorry to keep bugging you, but I just landed on harvest and my kerbal cant walk, he'll just act as if the ground was a part of a ship and slide on it with his jetpack. Is this a glitch or can you not walk on planets?

> 
> Sorry to keep bugging you, but I just landed on harvest and my kerbal cant walk, he'll just act as if the ground was a part of a ship and slide on it with his jetpack. Is this a glitch or can you not walk on planets?

[There's a fix for that available](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/138438)

> 
> [There's a fix for that available](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/138438)

Please... 

BTW everyone I plan on putting this thread on hiatus, since Ashley (former dev) is making a planet pack derived from this. The current mod will be renamed to Kerbol Origins and will attain the spirit of the original SQUAD ideas the mod is based on. Cheers and expect a solid bug-free fully optimised release on Christmas. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

With Dropbox keeping me up-to-date with the latest version, I am almost sure I can get all EVE functions to work before Christmas. You just keep working on fixing the issues while I'll get the clouds to work.

There are a few things I must ask and point out, however:

- Has Keelon's atmosphere been fixed?

- The config filepaths now use 'KerbalOrigins' instead of 'KerbolPlus', though the files are still located in the 'KerbolPlus' directory.

> 
> With Dropbox keeping me up-to-date with the latest version, I am almost sure I can get all EVE functions to work before Christmas. You just keep working on fixing the issues while I'll get the clouds to work.

.
I will fix Keelon's atmo, along with its terrain so it is proceduraly generated, when I do another pass around Keelon system development.

On my side the folder is renamed to Kerbol Origins, so I dunno what happened on your side... I migh need to reinvite you.

\*THIS POST WILL BE COPIED INTO BOTH K+ THREADS\*

I happened to notice, there is a small battle for quality and quantity between this mod and its counterpart. KillAshley, I thank you for taking over this mod, I did happen to notice the license violation from the original. What amarius1 did was wrong, and yet he still only maintains the mod for praise rather than make it more detailed.

Please, amarius1, there is no point of continuing the mod for your self after KillAshley took over it. KillAshley, keep up the good work!!!

I'm developing this with the scope of recreating Nova's ideas. KillAshley will continue with his K+, but I'll continue this one as Kerbol Origins, a pack much closer to the original SQUAD ideas. I am not mentaining the mod for praise, but I released messy and slow updates because of my lack of time and resources. Please understand.
